title: WILL YOU MARRY A SAILOR HOSTAGE IN SOMALIA
description: Have you ever dared a life-threatening adventure?Meet Ankit, who chose merchant navy as a career despite being acoward. But world around him is yet to discover that.They know him asa lively sailor and someone who would fall for any girl that he comesacross. Will he ever meet that girl who would touch the strings of hisheart? Will his true hidden character ever come out? Feel the touchinglove story of the sailor who meets an uncommon destiny on the highseas. Join him on one of his voyages that turns out to be moreeventful than he had ever imagined.
author: Rohit Lal
